Revision 1.4 2009/01/12 22:23:43 rsingh04 commented out extra chunking scheme
Revision 1.3 2005/10/18 17:12:37 lcerrato candientem on 12.91 changed to candentem based on user report and PHI
Revision 1.2 2005/08/01 16:34:36 packel removed stray item tags

Revision 1.13 2005/03/23 18:15:03 lcerrato changed visus line 10.447 to visu based on multiple sources

Revision 1.10 2003/02/06 21:06:16 lcerrato fixed typo 5.627 eum freta to cum freta
Revision 1.9 2000/03/04 20:35:31 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.8 2000/02/22 18:18:56 textgod fixed multiple typos
Revision 1.7 1999/10/25 19:20:53 lcerrato fixed typo 1.90
Revision 1.6 1999/10/16 06:38:47 lcerrato fixed typo
